phrases.text: Hội xuân mở đúng bao giờ
phrases.english: When will the spring festival open

culturalContext.description: Opening question about timing of spring festival celebrations
facts: Spring festivals (hội xuân) are major Vietnamese cultural events
Traditional festivals follow lunar calendar, creating anticipation
culturalContext.musicalContext: Question creates musical anticipation and rhythmic rowing pattern

culturalContext.description: Answers the question with specific timing
facts: Twenty years suggests a generational cycle
'chẵn' (exactly) emphasizes the precision of the timing

phrases.english: And now the time has passed

culturalContext.description: Reflects on the passage of time and arrival of the festival
facts: Temporal awareness is central to Vietnamese festival culture
The phrase suggests both anticipation fulfilled and time's passage

phrases.text: Hò ơ khoan khoan hỡi hò khoan
phrases.english: Ho, slowly slowly, oh ho slowly

culturalContext.description: Traditional boat rowing refrain calling for coordinated effort
facts: 'Hò' is the traditional Vietnamese rowing call
Boat songs (hò chèo) synchronized group labor
culturalContext.musicalContext: Rhythmic rowing refrain with call-and-response pattern
